docs.text:
Welcome to the Writeups section. Here you will find clean, simple pages for each CTF or project.

  • Sunshine CTF Writeup

docs.title: About
docs.text: I'm Ram — cybersecurity enthusiast and CTF player. This site hosts my writeups and projects.

docs.title: Sunshine CTF Writeup
docs.text: This page contains the writeup for Sunshine CTF. No styling, no special effects — just clean, simple text.
